summary: An arrogant Texas millionaire hires four adventurers to rescue his kidnapped wife from a notorious Mexican bandit.
cast: Burt Lancaster|Lee Marvin|Robert Ryan|Woody Strode|Jack Palance|Claudia Cardinale|Ralph Bellamy|Joe De Santis|Rafael Bertrand|Jorge Martínez de Hoyos|Marie Gomez|José Chávez|Carlos Romero|Vaughn Taylor|David Cadiente|Vincente Cadiente|Elizabeth Campbell|Don Carlos|Leigh Chapman|Roberto Contreras|Dirk Evans|Foster Hood|Darwin Lamb|Eddie Little Sky|John Lopez|John McKee|Henry O'Brien|Philip L. Parslow|Ron Veto
title: Los profesionales
